XXvabhdicu:2098_3: anyāni trīṇyapramāṇāni ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣvanāgamye dhyānāntare caturṣu dhyāneṣu /
XXvabhdicu:2098_4: kecit punaḥ cintāmayānyapyetāni pramodyaṃ ca prīterdharmāntaraṃ iti teṣāṃ saptabhūmikā /
XXvabhdicu:2101_1: ādhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatīti dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:2101_2: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyeṇa sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:2101_3: teṣāṃ dvāvaśubhasvabhāvau prathamau tadākāratvād bhūmitaśca tau sasāmantakayoḥ prathamadvitīyayordhyānayordhyānāntare ca /
XXvabhdicu:2102_0: catvāro 'nye vimokṣāḥ samāhitāḥ kuśalā evārūpyāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:2104_1: etadyathākramamaudārikam / [Jaini_431] ataḥ sūkṣmasūkṣmākhyaṃ bhavāgrānantaraṃ tāṃ samāpattiṃ samāpadyante /
XXvabhdicu:2110_0: sūtre bhagavatā aṣṭau abhibhavāyatanānyākhyātāni “adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī [Jaini_432] bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati suvarṇadurvarṇāni khalu rūpāṇi abhibhūya jānāti,
XXvabhdicu:2110_1: abhibhūya paśyati, evaṃ saṃjñī ca bhavatīdaṃ prathamamabhibhvāyatanam /
XXvabhdicu:2110_2: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyapramāṇāni suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaro yāvadidaṃ dvitīyamabhibhvāyatanam /
XXvabhdicu:2110_3: evamadhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahī rūpāṇi paśyati parīttānyapramāṇāni ceti catvāri /
XXvabhdicu:2110_4: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñyeva ca bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlapītalauhitāvadāta.
XXvabhdicu:2111_0: ........... abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
